about.title: Hi, I’m Platon&nbspLapp
about.description:
And also a Full-Stack Web Developer. I mostly write Frontend on Vue, Backend on Django. Also familiar with React, React-Native, PHP, Laravel.

You can contact me or view my work thanks to the icons...
